message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $11,500. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your perspective, but the value of this product to you is significant. How about we settle at $11,000? It's a fair deal that reflects the true worth of what you're getting.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $11,000. How about we meet at $10,750? I'm willing to compromise, but I'm trying to stay within my budget
